changeSet.author: simone
changeSet.sql: UPDATE ddp_medical_record as m, ( SELECT m.medical_record_id from ddp_medical_record m left join ddp_institution i on (i.institution_id = m.institution_id) left join ddp_participant p on (p.participant_id = i.participant_id) left join ddp_instance realm on (p.ddp_instance_id = realm.ddp_instance_id) where realm.instance_name = 'Prostate' and (p.ddp_participant_id like '1771332079%' OR p.ddp_participant_id like '-763171247%') and type = 'INITIAL_BIOPSY' and i.ddp_institution_id != '1' and i.institution_id < 20000) as m2 SET m.deleted = 1 WHERE m2.medical_record_id = m.medical_record_id;
